page.description: Specify how the field should be formatted using an Xbasic expression.

discussion.p: Specify how this field should be formatted. Enter an Xbasic expression that uses the *[xb:<value>]* placeholder to format the data. It may be necessary to wrap the *[xb:<value>]* placeholder in the *[xb:convert_type()]* function to ensure that *[xb:<value>]* returns the correct data type that your format expression expects.

page.note: This option is not available if this List is the parent of a child List and it pre-fetches the data for the child List. Instead, define a client-side format.
